name: py-alpaca-farm

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.

dependencies.name: py-accelerate
dependencies.description:
A simple way to train and use PyTorch models with multi-GPU, TPU, mixed-
precision.

dependencies.name: py-alpaca-eval
dependencies.description:
An automatic evaluator for instruction-following language models. Human-
validated, high-quality, cheap, and fast.

dependencies.name: py-datasets
dependencies.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependencies.name: py-einops
dependencies.description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.

dependencies.name: py-fire
dependencies.description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.

dependencies.name: py-markdown
dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.

dependencies.name: py-nltk
dependencies.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.

dependencies.name: py-openai
dependencies.description:
The OpenAI Python library provides convenient access to the OpenAI API
from applications written in the Python language. It includes a pre-
defined set of classes for API resources that initialize themselves
dynamically from API responses which makes it compatible with a wide
range of versions of the OpenAI API.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-sentencepiece
dependencies.description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
These are the Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-statsmodels
dependencies.description: Statistical computations and models for use with SciPy

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-tiktoken
dependencies.description: tiktoken is a fast BPE tokeniser for use with OpenAI's models.

dependencies.name: py-torch
dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependencies.name: py-transformers
dependencies.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependencies.name: py-wandb
dependencies.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
